description: Competitive intelligence topic taxonomy for capital markets database evaluation

performance_query_latency.name: Query Latency & Response Time
performance_query_latency.description: Sub-millisecond matters for pre-trade analytics, real-time risk, algo trading signals

performance_ingestion.name: Ingestion Throughput
performance_ingestion.description: Market data feeds generate millions of messages/second; can the DB keep up without back-pressure?

time_series_analytics.name: Time-Series Analytics Capabilities
time_series_analytics.description: ASOF joins, temporal joins, OHLCV aggregation, SAMPLE BY, VWAP, tick replay

sql_query_language.name: Query Language & SQL Support
sql_query_language.description: SQL familiarity vs. learning curve; JOIN support; window functions; subqueries; UDFs

high_availability.name: High Availability & Disaster Recovery
high_availability.description: Zero-downtime requirement for trading systems; replication; failover; RPO/RTO guarantees

streaming_realtime.name: Real-Time Streaming & CEP
streaming_realtime.description: Combine streaming and historical in one query? Event processing? Materialized views?

scalability_data_volume.name: Scalability & Data Volume Handling
scalability_data_volume.description: Petabyte-scale tick stores; years of history; horizontal vs. vertical scaling

security_compliance.name: Security, Authentication & Compliance
security_compliance.description: RBAC, encryption at rest/in transit, audit logging, SSO/OIDC for regulated environments

architecture_storage.name: Architecture & Storage Engine
architecture_storage.description: Column-store vs. row-store, WAL, compression, memory management, partitioning strategy

concurrency_multiuser.name: Concurrent Users & Workload Isolation
concurrency_multiuser.description: Can quants, traders, and risk all query simultaneously without degradation?

backtesting_historical.name: Backtesting & Historical Analysis
backtesting_historical.description: Replay tick data, point-in-time queries, large range scans across years of data

ai_ml_integration.name: AI/ML & Vector Data Integration
ai_ml_integration.description: Run models alongside time-series? Vector search? GPU acceleration? Python/PyKX integration?

cloud_deployment.name: Cloud & On-Premises Deployment
cloud_deployment.description: Flexibility matters â€” banks want on-prem or private cloud; hedge funds may want managed cloud

tier_3.name: Comes Up in Procurement / Final Decision

licensing_pricing.name: Licensing, Pricing & TCO
licensing_pricing.description: Open source vs. enterprise; per-core pricing; hidden costs of free

ecosystem_integration.name: Ecosystem & Third-Party Integration
ecosystem_integration.description: Connectors (Kafka, Spark, Grafana), language clients, ODBC/JDBC, API surface

developer_experience.name: Developer Experience & Hiring
developer_experience.description: Learning curve, documentation quality, community size, talent availability

operational_complexity.name: Operational Complexity
operational_complexity.description: Deployment, upgrades, monitoring, backup/restore, tuning overhead

vendor_maturity.name: Vendor Maturity & Track Record
vendor_maturity.description: How long in production? Which tier-1 banks use it? STAC benchmarks?
